sent.orig: Newer versions of the lawyer's practice certificate consists of lawyers and solicitors lawyer license work permit.
sent.trans: 新版律师执业证书分为律师执业证和律师工作证两大类。

sent.orig: Are you lawyer Chao? I mean that lawyer named Chao Tzu keng?
sent.trans: 你就是赵律师？我的意思是那位叫赵自耕的律师。

sent.orig: Lawyer Long Xiongbiao was employed as the analysis lawyer.
sent.trans: 政法频道的政法报道栏目对重大复杂案件需要律师参与点评，龙雄彪律师被聘请为点评律师。

sent.orig: She a business consultant and he was as a lawyer lawyer.
sent.trans: 克丽斯蒂是营业顾问，山姆则是律师。

sent.orig: You call him and tell him to bring his lawyer to our lawyer.
sent.trans: 你打电话让他带上他的律师来找我们的律师。
